channel.title: Jesus 4 Asia Now
channel.desc: Jon and Natalie Wood.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Salvation in Symbols and Signs
channel.desc: James Rafferty and Ivor Meyers, together with a panel of scholars, examine the third trumpet from the Book of Revelation and its symbolism.

channel.title: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel
channel.desc: The host teams up with a panel of religious scholars to conduct various discussions that provide an in-depth analysis on the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today
channel.desc: Conversing with guests on teachings of the Almighty, health tips and various other topics while encouraging followers to follow the path of spirituality.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Amazing Facts With Doug Batchelor
channel.desc: Near-death experiences reinforce the popular belief that souls go to heaven or hell as soon as the body dies; but in the Bible, the soul is said to be a living being and can die; scripture describes death as sleep from which we awake at resurrection.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Mission Revival
channel.desc: Religious speakers preach to the devotees about deepening their faith and commitment to Christ at a spiritual gathering.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Miracles in Motion
channel.desc: She heard about Jesus and felt His presence through a powerful prayer. As she read Hebrews 4, God convicted her about the Sabbath, leading her to search for the truth. After discovering 3ABN, she was captivated by the Bible-based teachings and soon found herself drawn to the Seventh-day Adventist faith. Kay shares how 3ABN helped her embrace the truth, leading to her baptism into the SDA church.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Strategies for Strongholds
channel.desc: Michael Carducci and Ivonne Restrepo discuss the critical elements needed for a healthy relationship.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Lineage
channel.desc: Adam Ramdin and Clive Coutet help Christians understand their spiritual lineage and determine their identity and life choices.

channel.desc: Healthy lifestyle information provided by Dick Nunez; a set of isotonic exercises.

channel.desc: Craft activities related to God's Word bring wonderful reminders of His power. Art can help someone come closer to Jesus.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today Bible Q&A
channel.desc: Many claim that the Bible is unreliable because it was written and altered by man; this is a notion the devil would be delighted for everyone to accept.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Evolution Impossible
channel.desc: The geological evidence for a catastrophic global flood; if there were people who survived, then there may be other historical evidence for a global catastrophe like that.

channel.desc: Scott and Julia feature four missionaries in different Southeast Asian countries and the challenges and joys of their work.

channel.desc: Casio Jones; Kevin Toms.

channel.desc: Creating healthy and delicious dishes in the kitchen with parents or friends is a great way to nourish the body, as well as the soul.

channel.desc: Miss Cinda demonstrates how to make Sloppy Salamis with tiny tots Levi, Shiloh, Christiana and John Wesley.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Sanctuary Salvation & Our Savior
channel.desc: The first compartment of the sanctuary is the courtyard; the courtyard is where people are covered and cleansed by the blood of Jesus; people are justified by faith through the blood of the Lamb in the courtyard.
